messages.title: The best choice for our area
messages.content: Tim Hill works hard all year round for local residents. He has been chosen again to stand in May's local elections.

messages.title: Don’t turn the clock back with the Tories
messages.content: Local residents still remember when the Tories ran the County Council. Roads and pavements were in terrible condition and the Council Tax was rising fast. Don’t forget the Tories in charge: Left our roads and pavements to ruin. Left £90 million debt for Borough taxpayers to pick up. Let our schools suffer because new school places where permanent buildings were needed.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Council Tax in Bedford Borough is lower than in neighbouring Tory-run Central Bedfordshire

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Linda Jack Campaigns for Tax Cuts for 25 Million People
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Linda Jack, Parliamentary Campaigner for Mid Bedfordshire, is supporting tax cuts that will deliver a further £400 cut.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two horse race, Labour can’t win. They finished a poor 4th last time.

leaflet.personalStatement: Tim Hill gets things done for our area.

quotes.text: Tim Hill works hard all year round for local residents.

images.caption: Roads and Pavements, Local Services Saved, Investing In Our Schools
